text: I'd like to be able to care of myself and my family now and in the future. It's a reality of this world that one of the things one needs to do that is a little bit of money. I know that the world is also getting increasingly competitive so I need to work hard if I want to get ahead. That means trying to work better and smarter than other people, and taking courses and putting my hand up for new work to make sure I am always  learning and getting new experiences.
